About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I'm fascinated by languages, both human and machine, and the connections between the two. I recently completed a BE in Electronics and Communication (ECE) at Rajalakshmi Institute of Technology in Chennai. In budding career i fell in love with software development, so i spent the fall of 2019 at the National Institute of Information Technology (NIIT),honing my coding skills by working on: improving my problem solving fluency, writing functional code,contributing to open-source projects,and making test-driven development a habit.
